title: Head Chef
description: We're looking for an experienced Head Chef to lead our kitchen team. Must have 5+ years experience in catering or restaurant management. Responsible for menu planning, team management, and maintaining high food quality standards.
requirements: Leadership, Menu Planning, Team Management, Food Safety, Quality Control

title: Sous Chef
description: Join our team as Sous Chef. Support the Head Chef and manage daily kitchen operations. 3+ years experience required. Must be skilled in Pakistani and Continental cuisine.
requirements: Cooking, Food Prep, Quality Control, Team Coordination, Time Management

title: Event Manager
description: Manage catering events from planning to execution. Coordinate with clients and ensure smooth operations. 2+ years experience in event management or hospitality required.
requirements: Event Planning, Client Relations, Coordination, Problem Solving, Communication

title: Kitchen Helper
description: Entry-level position for kitchen support. Help with food preparation, cleaning, and basic cooking tasks. No experience required, training will be provided.
requirements: Food Prep, Cleaning, Team Work, Physical Stamina, Willingness to Learn

title: Waiter/Server
description: Serve food and beverages at events. Provide excellent customer service. Flexible hours, perfect for students. Weekend availability required.
requirements: Customer Service, Communication, Presentation, Multitasking, Friendly Attitude

title: Delivery Driver
description: Deliver catering orders to clients. Must have valid driving license and own vehicle. Punctuality is essential. Knowledge of Karachi routes preferred.
requirements: Driving License, Own Vehicle, Time Management, Navigation, Reliability

title: Marketing Executive
description: Promote our catering services through digital and traditional marketing channels. Manage social media, create content, and generate leads. 1-2 years experience in marketing preferred.
requirements: Social Media, Content Creation, Lead Generation, Communication, Creativity

title: Pastry Chef
description: Specialize in creating desserts, pastries, and baked goods for events. Must have expertise in both traditional and modern dessert preparation. 2+ years experience required.
requirements: Baking, Pastry Making, Creativity, Attention to Detail, Recipe Development
